duties_responsibilities.duty: Strategic development and administration of contracts with State and/or Federal governments for healthcare programs.
Coordinate, conduct, and respond to research requests pertaining to government healthcare programs.
Prepare and submit regulatory reports for filings and review Plan submissions for quality, accuracy, and timeliness.
Review contract reporting deliverables for compliance with contractual and regulatory requirements prior to submission.
Assess and disseminate information received from government contracting agencies and regulators to impacted Plan staff.
Participate in meetings related to government run programs and disseminate relevant information to staff and management.
Oversee and maintain the department's documentation and archive system, ensuring submitted reports are archived for historical and audit purposes.
Ensure department's system is updated and complete.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or equivalent (Bachelor's Degree preferred)
